data.utilizationMethod: Use the upright backrest as a vertical canvas and sweep the curved handle across the leather surface
Hold the pen near its writing tip with a tripod grip and move the wrist to sketch on an imaginary surface.
Grip the rim with fingertips and thumb, then crush the side walls inward in small squeezes progressing toward the base
Use the desk exactly as it sits; place the pen tip on the tabletop and move it freely across the laminate surface.

data.proxyObjectName: black and white patterned umbrella with curved handle
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the shaft near its midpoint between thumb and index finger and sweep the curved handle end through the air like a large brush

data.proxyObjectName: telescoping metal selfie stick with black plastic handle
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the black handle, extend the telescoping rod fully, press the phone holder clamp against a wall, and sweep it up and down in large arcs.
